User’s Guide¶

Welcome to the Curie User’s Guide! The user’s guide is an introduction to the essential classes in Curie, along with some examples. For more details about the methods and attributes of these classes, visit the Curie API.

The Getting Started page gives a brief overview of each available class. The other links provide more specific details and examples.

  • 1. Getting Started
    • 1.1. Installation
    • 1.2. Spectroscopy
    • 1.3. Stopping Power Calculations
    • 1.4. Decay Chains
    • 1.5. Nuclear Data Libraries
  • 2. Spectroscopy
  • 3. Isotopes & Decay Chains
  • 4. Reactions
  • 5. Stopping Power Calculations
